status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"31die","text":"For mCherry-OPTN, clone human OPTN cDNA in a pETDuet-1 vector with an N-terminal  6x His tag follow it by a TEV cleavage site (Addgene #190191).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5e9gq","text":"After the transformation of the  pETDuet-1 vector encoding 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-OPTN in E. coli Rosetta pLySS cells, grow cells in 2x TY medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continue at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":85,"length":7},{"style":"sub","offset":157,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":144,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":189,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"84A3222014AF11EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"81C7526014AF11EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17i3o","text":"Once the cells reached an OD600 of 0.8, induce protein expression with   IPTG for   at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":28,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dchb6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"BA506F9014AF11EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"C702DCF014AF11EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C913E2A014AF11EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6jdmq","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation and resuspend in lysis buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bku6a","text":"Clear Lysates by centrifugation at   in a SORVAL RC6+ centrifuge with an F21S-8x50Y rotor (Thermo Scientific).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"18000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3DF378B014B011EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1o1kn","text":"Filter the supernatant through an   filter and load onto a preequilibrated   His-Trap HP column (Cytiva).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"59AC559014B011EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"0.45"}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"5C28792014B011EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"mvgd","text":"After His tagged proteins were bound to the column, wash the column with three column volumes of wash buffer A. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7en6s","text":"Elute proteins with a stepwise imidazole gradient (30, 75, 100, 150, 225, 300 mM) by increasing addition of buffer B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8epu4","text":"Pool the fractions at 75-100 mM imidazole that contains the 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-OPTN.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ds8k","text":"Incubate the pooled samples   with TEV protease at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"E165D15014B011EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E41E61A014B011EEA079B725638CF2DB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jkjf","text":"After the 6xHis tag was cleaved off, concentrate the protein using a 50 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore) and load onto a pre-equilibrated Superdex 200 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2p8f6","text":"After concentrating the purified protein, aliquot the protein and snap-freeze in liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Expression and purification of mCherry-OPTN
